author: jochembrouwer
content: Hi all, quick and simple suggestion: if an EIP requires another EIP, could these EIPs have URLs to the other EIPs? ðŸ™‚

author: abcoathup
content:
There is already a requires section, see EIP1

> requires: EIP number(s) (Optional field)
https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1#eip-formats-and-templates

The EIP website then links to the required EIPs.
